dc:title: Benchmark Database of Phonetic Alignments (Germanic)
dc:bibliographicCitation: List, Johann-Mattis and Jelena Prokić. (2014). A benchmark database of phonetic alignments in historical linguistics and dialectology. In: Proceedings of the International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC), 26 — 31 May 2014, Reykjavik. 288-294.
dc:comment: LexiBank data only shows a small of the full data in the original source, which contains mainly dialectal data.
